channel.title: Slipknot
channel.description:
Anyone here like em lol? Post opinions are what songs you like, or hate if you don't like em :D, post what you think here.
My favourite album is probably Iowa, songs I mostly listen to are Eyeless, Wait and bleed, Liberate, People = shit, Disasterpiece, My Plague, Everything ends, I am hated, Vermillion, Vermillion pt2. XD

gently (M.F.K.R.)

item.title: Slipknot
item.dc:creator: @killer_kure killer kure
item.description:
@killer_kure wrote:

I didn’t split up they all have side bands such as
Corey and the guitar player James are in “Stone Sour”… few people know this…but those few people are gay

Joe: the drummer is in a band called “murderdolls”
Shawn: one of the percussionest is in a band called “To My Suprise”
Sid: ours around…he’s a dj his name is “Dj StarScream”

So there…that’s what they are doing right now…but i wouldn’t be suprised if they didn’t make another cd every1 has seen their faces which kinda ruins the image they where trying to make

Read full topic

item.title: Slipknot
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

Alex Owns:

Not that I believe in influencing (I have my own mind, thank you) I think Slipknot is an utter waste of time to listen to, the songs are worthless, no meaning, and the music in general is out of my taste.

Actually, their songs don’t really have much point, but really I don’t give a fuck, if I like the sound of it I listen to it :p, I didn’t really like slipknot that much at first tbh, you just gotta listen to their older albums (iowa’s probably the best), then you’ll agree with me

Read full topic

item.title: Slipknot
item.dc:creator: @Ignis Ignis
item.description:
@Ignis wrote:

Mjordan,
You’ve never listened to slipknot yet your saying that they sound wierd? How the hell would you know what they sound like if you’ve never heard them.

Kxolsd,
Is listening to any band something to be proud of? Next time your listening to whatever the hell you listen to, and you feel like giving yourself a pat on the back let me know ok?

ilyaostr9
I’ve never heard of this “slipknow” band. They sound awfull.

llxalis,
Do you call everyone a wanna be for likeing a band you don’t?

Rambit Td,
Having 9 members in your bank doesn’t cloud the music, it adds more layers. If having 9 members made music clouded, then Orchestras and such would be screwed.

Alex owns,
The songs arn’t worthless, and do have a meaning. Your just too damn stupid to understand them.

Ok, now that I’ve said that…
My favorite songs by them are Left Behind, Before I forget, Pulse of the Maggots, Wait and Bleed. I like the Vol 3 cd because it shows a new side to slipknot, and also has the best guitar parts

Read full topic
